thread.title: Great little boutique hotel
thread.title_full: Great little boutique hotel - Review of Hotel Saint-Jacques, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: grahamhastings71
title: Great little boutique hotel
text: The Saint-Jacques is a lovely little boutique hotel in the Latin Quarter of Paris, just down the road from the Sorbonne. It's withing walking distance of Notre Dame and the museums and was a great base for a romantic weekend in Paris. The room was beautifully decorated, and surprising quiet considering how close we were to the centre of town. There are numerous fantastic restaurants close by and the closeness of various parks made the stay very peaceful when we needed to get away from the noise and bright lights of the more tourist areas. We would definitely stay again.
